mapper.insert: insert into meeting (regMemberId, categoryId, regionId, ageRangeId, title, content, detailRegion, maxMember, startedAt, contact, genderCategory) values(#{regMemberId}, #{categoryId}, #{regionId}, #{ageRangeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{detailRegion}, #{maxMember}, #{startedAt}, #{contact} ,#{genderCategory})
mapper.select: select m.title, m.startedAt, m.detailRegion, m.content, m.maxMember, m.viewCount,c.name categoryName, r.name regionName from meeting m join category c on m.categoryId = c.id join region r on m.regionId = r.id where m.id = #{id};
